comments.raw_text: The way the parser command is passed through MarkAsNotScriptCreated() is ugly API design. The command and script-createdness would ideally be parameters passed to the constructor.
comments.text: The way the parser command is passed through MarkAsNotScriptCreated() is ugly API design. The command and script-createdness would ideally be parameters passed to the constructor.
comments.creator: hsivonen@mozilla.com
